ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
There are silent Ghosts, there are noisy Ghosts, there are Ghosts that want to kill you! And then there is Crypt Chick. Jon's announcement that he is to wed the Witch Tarot infuriates the jealous She Ghost! So much so She wants Jon dead! It's Crypt Chick vs. the Skeleton Man!
